subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care
Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
Keep Vaccines Voluntary Act

This bill requires businesses, institutions of higher education, and state and local governments that receive certain COVID-19 relief funds to certify that they will not limit access to services or otherwise discriminate on the basis of an individual's COVID-19 vaccination status.
